basics.name: Gilang Gumilar
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I have three years of experience working as a software engineer at two unicorn startup companies based in Indonesia. I like exploring both frontend and backend technologies. I like coding and being a life-long learner.

work.summary: Traveloka is an Indonesian unicorn company that provides airline ticketing, hotel booking services, and lifestyle products. I work as a full-stack engineer building Axes for Biz which is a public self-onboard platform of Traveloka Xperience products.
highlights: Maintain and implement UI forms. (ReactJS, Next.js)
Improve the landing page performance (Lighthouse audit) by 154%. (ReactJS, Chrome DevTools)
Design and implement database models and backend services. (PostgreSQL, Java)
Implement a CI/CD of the static web frontend. (AWS, Terraform, Next.js)
Research and Implement a serverless stack. (AWS, Serverless Framework)

work.summary: Bukalapak is an Indonesian unicorn company and one of the leading online marketplaces in Indonesia. I worked as a part-time frontend engineer at Core Frontend team.
highlights: Implemented an internal dashboard of Core Trust and Safety team. (Vue.js, VueX, Vuetify, Express.js)
Implemented a Vue UI Component Library. (Vue.js, Storybook, Jest, SASS)

work.summary: GoriTax is a curated tax and accounting experts as a service.
highlights: Designed the database (SQL, PostgreSQL), created the backend with a RESTful API (Python, Django, Django REST framework), and created the server infrastructure (Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, Kops, Gitlab CI/CD).
Implemented the frontend with a frontend engineer. (ReactJS, Redux, Material-UI)

work.summary: Bukalapak is an Indonesian unicorn company and one of the leading online marketplaces in Indonesia.
highlights: Rewrote the product detail page on the mobile web using Vue.js and RESTful API. (Vue.js, VueX, Nuxt.js)

volunteer.summary: GitLab is an open source web-based DevOps lifecycle tool. I contribute to GitLab by fixing and implementing several features. (Vue.js, Ruby on Rails)
highlights: The Grand Prize Winner of GitLab's Q2 Hackathon 2020.
The Second Place Winner of GitLab's Q3 Hackathon 2020.

awards.title: Triplebyte Certified Front End Engineer
awards.summary: I scored in the top 10% of test takers on the Triplebyte assessment for Front-end. This assessment covers general programmatic problem solving, JavaScript, CSS, HTTP, and full-stack architecture. https://triplebyte.com/tb/gilang-gumilar-chcqgkj/certificate/track/front-end
